CatDescriptText: Two signs on building read "Brook's clothes, coat, topcoat, use our layaway plan" and "Brook's clothes, hard finished, worsted, use our budget plan"
TitMainTitle: Woman wearing sash inscribed "Passavant H...", eyeglasses, and dress with girl on swing pattern, holding collection box and flowers, with another woman wearing checkered dress holding boy with pinwheel, on left, in front of Brook's store window with "Fall..." banner, possibly downtown Pittsburgh
